subject: Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Lesotho’s Mabuthile Lebopo won South Africa’s Two Oceans ultra-marathon, finishing the 34.8-mile course in 3 hours 6 minutes 18 seconds.
snippet: Lesotho’s Mabuthile Lebopo won South Africa’s Two Oceans ultra-marathon, finishing the 34.8-mile course in 3 hours 6 minutes 18 seconds.
